definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: So, you can make 2N different types of milkshakes.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你一共可以做2N中不同口味的奶昔。

sentences.english: Do you found stamp collect or gardening more to your taste?
sentences.chinese: 您觉得是集邮还是园艺更合您的口味？
那干酪是重口味的《切达》。

sentences.english: The berry is nutritious and has a sweetish taste.
sentences.chinese: 浆果有营养并且有一种带甜味的口味。

sentences.english: Cater to their needs, and be prepared to handle every imaginable mistake.
sentences.chinese: 要迎合他们的口味，准备应对每一个想象得到的错误。

sentences.english: The local dishes are robust and challenging, featuring mainly pork.
sentences.chinese: 地方菜口味浓重，令人回味无穷，以猪肉主料为特色。

sentences.english: The condiments vary from family to family, but fresh chili powder is a must-have.
sentences.chinese: 调料的口味各家不同，只有现磨的干辣椒粉必不可少。

sentences.english: Let's have a fling and eat at that expensive restaurant for a change.
sentences.chinese: 咱们痛快一下，到那间高级餐馆吃一顿来换换口味。

sentences.english: It will be a possession game virtually every game, probably to a fan's delight.
sentences.chinese: 几乎每场都会是寸土必争的比赛，也许正对球迷口味。

sentences.english: Or you can add vanilla extract to a serving for a vanilla flavor. Garnish with mint leaves.
sentences.chinese: 还可以放香草精做成香草口味，或是用薄荷叶做装饰。

sentences.english: Going to the market and drinking a bowl of sheep's haslet soup also is an enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 赶集时喝碗羊杂割汤也算是改善了一回口味。

sentences.english: Most Chinese restaurants in New Zealand feature Cantonese cuisineadapted to Western tastes.
sentences.chinese: 新西兰大多数中餐馆都是适合西方人口味的广东菜。

sentences.english: Some people may think this dish is sightly hot for their taste.
sentences.chinese: 有些人会觉得对他们的口味来说，这道莱有点儿辣。

sentences.english: The soup is quite to my taste.
There are no artificial colors of flavors in our Meat Blast Brand Twists.
sentences.chinese: 有没有在我们的口味高炉品牌弯人造肉的颜色。

sentences.english: Will tell from the taste, the biggest characteristic is TaiCan drizzle.
sentences.chinese: 从口味来讲，酸辣是泰餐最大的特点。

definition: taste/texture (of food)/how food feels in the mouth
authentic taste/plain cooked/natural flavor (without spices and seasonings)
ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
dish (food prepared according to a specific recipe)
five spice seasoned/incorporating the five basic flavors of Chinese cooking (sweet, sour, bitter, savory, salty)
